front.title: Telephone Number Mapping (ENUM) Service Registration for MGCP

abstract.t: MGCP decomposes a multimedia gateway into two parts, a call agent and a media gateway,thus brings greater extensibility and makes it easy to construct a large-scale VoIP network. This document registers the MGCP Enumservice according to the guidelines given in RFC 3761.This kind of Enumservice is mainly applied in Carrier Networks.
